thread.section_title: WeBuyBack.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WeBuyBack.com.au | webuyback.com.au
thread.title: Sandy

author: Sandy
title: Sandy
text: Well, it's been a while now (last year) since we onsold our devices, but when we did WBB paid promptly, covering the sending of the device and following up. They did contact to drop the payment on 2 devices due to pink screen, but the drop in price was acceptable. I mention this just in case every customer experienced pink screen. Then you might ditch a star or 2. Still, I was very pleased and would refer them on.
